summary: A utility script that transforms a BLIP Diffusion model checkpoint built from the LAVIS source repository into the Hugging Face Diffusers format by extracting and remapping model components such as the visual encoder, Q-Former, UNet, VAE, scheduler, tokenizer, and image processor, then saving the converted model for downstream use.
business_intent: Allow developers to leverage BLIP Diffusion models within the Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying deployment, inference, and integration with other Hugging Face tools.
